mapper.sql: id, channel_no AS channelNo, customer_no AS customerNo, open_id AS openId, receiver, receiver_state AS receiverState, receiver_city AS receiverCity, receiver_district AS receiverDistrict, address_detail AS addressDetail, telephone, identity_card AS identityCard, idcard_pic_front AS idcardPicFront, idcard_pic_reverse AS idcardPicReverse, is_default AS isDefault, gmt_create AS gmtCreate, gmt_modify AS gmtModify, is_del AS isDel, creator, modifier
